page.title: 14HARLEYFORD MANOR,NR. MARLOW
page.content: {HARLEYFORD MANOR ESTATE The Manor was built in 1753.The Claytons who owned it also owned Bisham Abbey,Bisham Village and most of Marlow.Baronet Sir William Clayton was an M.P.and Lord Mayor of London. His statue is now in the grounds at Harleyford. Today Harleyford is owned by Harleyford Estates.They run a service for mooring boats and a huge marina.At present 420 privately owned boats are moored there.There is also a caravan park containing 400 caravans. The manor is being transformed into office accommadation.There are cottages rented out to estate workers. The estate is surrounded by woodland.
